entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 04:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
